name: listmonk
description: Listmonk is a high-performance self-hosted mailing list and newsletter manager with a slick UI. It supports subscriber segmentation, templating, API integration, and sending bulk email through SMTP providers.
features: Newsletter Management: Mailing lists, Subscriber segmentation, Campaign scheduling. Professional email marketing platform.
High Performance: Bulk email sending, SMTP integration, Fast delivery. Handle large subscriber lists efficiently.
Template System: Rich editor, Custom templates, Personalization. Create beautiful newsletters.
Analytics: Open rates, Click tracking, Subscriber insights. Measure campaign effectiveness.
